name: Muses
description:
What is Muses?

A light puzzle game for 3–5 players competing to win favor from the nine Muses of Ancient Greece. Enjoy the beta 1.0 release and send feedback.

You'll download

A PDF of the rules, the cards, and tokens in easy-to-print page format.

Info
3–5 Players | 30min | Ages 10+

You'll also need

  • Some scissors

You can also subscribe to the mod on Tabletop Simulator to play online.
